DOC.brief_summary: Sperm DNA integrity will be measured via the Toluidine Blue Assay (TBA) for patients undergoing In Vitro Fertilization (IVF); the study will determine correlations, if any, between IVF success and sperm DNA integrity.
DOC.brief_title: Impact of Sperm DNA Integrity on In Vitro Cycles
DOC.criteria: couple undergoing IVF at the Center for Human Reproduction sperm sample given from partner (not a donor) low sperm concentration (<5 million/cc) using a donor sample
